description:
Haruno invites Satsuki and the rest to join an event where they take pictures and eat while walking. The three girls happily accept, thinking it`s the perfect event for the Cinephoto Club, but they find out they`ll be going around shops that serve generous portions of food to the point they`ll be full! They`re disappointed in the food brought to them, but this is just the beginning of their fight.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: A Comfy Manga Artist Goes On a Winery Tour - Motovlog Part 13 / Taking Pictures of Food and Getting Full Until We Explode
Iyashikei Mangaka Winery Meguri: Motovlog Part 13 / Manpuku Photo Ralley: Manpuku Chuusuushinkei Kanzen Hakai
癒し系マンガ家ワイナリー巡り ~モトブログパート13~ / まんぷくフォトラリー ~満腹中枢神経完全破壊~
